channel.title: elections on Independentoutlook
channel.description: Recent content in elections on Independentoutlook

item.title: 2016 election
item.description: The 2016 U.S. presidential election was held on November 8, 2016, and featured a highly polarizing contest between Republican nominee Donald J. Trump and Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton. Trump, a businessman and television personality, was a political outsider, while Clinton, a former Secretary of State, was a seasoned politician.

item.title: 2020 election
item.description: The 2020 U.S. presidential election took place on November 3, 2020, amidst the COVID-19 pandemic and heightened political tensions. The election was one of the most contentious in U.S. history, with high voter turnout and a record number of mail-in ballots due to the pandemic. The primary candidates were the incumbent Republican President Donald J. Trump and Democratic challenger Joseph R. Biden Jr., who had served as Vice President under President Barack Obama.
